stephen ra

data scientist

Hi there



I'm a data scientist at Pfizer.

I previously worked on my ph.d. in applied and computational statistics where i was interested in statistical learning for high-dimensional data.
I was also engaged in translational genetics research aimed at understanding how changes at the level of the genome and epigenome alter the pathophysiology and treatment of affective disorders.
I am passionate about developing and applying machine learning for data-driven solutions.
